verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man שִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> set פָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> against mount שֵׂעִ֑יר <S%H8165><s%> Seir וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> and prophesy עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וְאָמַ֣רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> And say לּ֗וֹ כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> unto it Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> behold אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> I am against הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> Behold O mount שֵׂעִ֑יר <S%H8165><s%> Seir וְנָטִ֤יתִי <S%H5186><s%> I [am] against thee and I will stretch out יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> mine hand עָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> against וּנְתַתִּ֖יךָ <S%H5414><s%> against thee and I will make שְׁמָמָ֥ה <S%H8077><s%> desolate וּמְשַׁמָּֽה׃ <S%H4923><s%> thee most

עָרֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5892><s%> thy cities חָרְבָּ֣ה <S%H2723><s%> waste אָשִׂ֔ים <S%H7760><s%> I will lay וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you שְׁמָמָ֣ה <S%H8077><s%> and thou shalt be desolate תִֽהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> will become וְיָדַעְתָּ֖ <S%H3045><s%> and thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD

יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because הֱי֤וֹת <S%H1961><s%> have had לְךָ֙ אֵיבַ֣ת <S%H342><s%> hatred עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> Because thou hast had a perpetual וַתַּגֵּ֥ר <S%H5064><s%> and hast shed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> [the blood of] the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יְדֵי־ <S%H3027><s%> by the force חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword בְּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> in the time אֵידָ֔ם <S%H343><s%> of their calamity בְּעֵ֖ת <S%H6256><s%> in the time עֲוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> [that their] iniquity קֵֽץ׃ <S%H7093><s%> [had] an end

לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> Therefore [as] I live אָ֗נִי <S%H589><s%> I נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לְדָ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> thee unto blood אֶעֶשְׂךָ֖ <S%H6213><s%> I will prepare וְדָ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> and blood יִרְדֲּפֶ֑ךָ <S%H7291><s%> shall pursue אִם־ <S%H518><s%> thee sith לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not דָ֛ם <S%H1818><s%> blood שָׂנֵ֖אתָ <S%H8130><s%> thou hast not hated וְדָ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> even blood יִרְדֲּפֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7291><s%> shall pursue

וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <S%H5414><s%> Thus will I make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> mount שֵׂעִ֔יר <S%H8165><s%> Seir לְשִֽׁמְמָ֖ה <S%H8077><s%> most וּשְׁמָמָ֑ה <S%H8077><s%> desolate וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <S%H3772><s%> and cut off מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> who עֹבֵ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> from it him that passeth out וָשָֽׁב׃ <S%H7725><s%> and him that returneth

וּמִלֵּאתִ֥י <S%H4390><s%> And I will fill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָ֖יו <S%H2022><s%> his mountains חֲלָלָ֑יו <S%H2491><s%> with his slain גִּבְעוֹתֶ֤יךָ <S%H1389><s%> [men] in thy hills וְגֵאוֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1516><s%> and in thy valleys וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲפִיקֶ֔יךָ <S%H650><s%> and in all thy rivers חַלְלֵי־ <S%H2491><s%> that are slain חֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword יִפְּל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> shall they fall בָהֶֽם׃

שִֽׁמְמ֤וֹת <S%H8077><s%> desolations עוֹלָם֙ <S%H5769><s%> thee perpetual אֶתֶּנְךָ֔ <S%H5414><s%> I will make וְעָרֶ֖יךָ <S%H5892><s%> and thy cities לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not [תֵישַׁבְנָה כ] (תָשֹׁ֑בְנָה <S%H3427><s%> abide ק) וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD

יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because אֲ֠מָרְךָ <S%H559><s%> Because thou hast said אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֨י <S%H8147><s%> These two הַגּוֹיִ֜ם <S%H1471><s%> nations וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁתֵּ֧י <S%H8147><s%> and these two הָאֲרָצ֛וֹת <S%H776><s%> countries לִ֥י תִהְיֶ֖ינָה <S%H1961><s%> become וִֽירַשְׁנ֑וּהָ <S%H3423><s%> shall be mine and we will possess וַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> it whereas the LORD שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> was there הָיָֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> Therefore [as] I live אָ֗נִי <S%H589><s%> I נְאֻם֮ <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3069><s%> GOD וְעָשִׂ֗יתִי <S%H6213><s%> I will even do כְּאַפְּךָ֙ <S%H639><s%> according to thine anger וּכְקִנְאָ֣תְךָ֔ <S%H7068><s%> and according to thine envy אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשִׂ֔יתָה <S%H6213><s%> which thou hast used מִשִּׂנְאָתֶ֖יךָ <S%H8135><s%> out of thy hatred בָּ֑ם וְנוֹדַ֥עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> against them and I will make myself known בָ֖ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אֶשְׁפְּטֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8199><s%> among them when I have judged

וְֽיָדַעְתָּ֮ <S%H3045><s%> And thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי ׀ <S%H8085><s%> [and that] I have heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נָאָֽצוֹתֶ֗יךָ <S%H5007><s%> all thy blasphemies אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אָמַ֛רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> which thou hast spoken עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הָרֵ֥י <S%H2022><s%> against the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> saying [שָׁמֵמָה כ] (שָׁמֵ֑מוּ <S%H8074><s%> make amazed ק) לָ֥נוּ נִתְּנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> they are given לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <S%H402><s%> us to consume

וַתַּגְדִּ֤ילוּ <S%H1431><s%> ye have boasted עָלַי֙ <S%H5921><s%> against בְּפִיכֶ֔ם <S%H6310><s%> Thus with your mouth וְהַעְתַּרְתֶּ֥ם <S%H6280><s%> against me and have multiplied עָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> against דִּבְרֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1697><s%> your words אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I שָׁמָֽעְתִּי׃ <S%H8085><s%> against me I have heard ס

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD כִּשְׂמֹ֙חַ֙ <S%H8055><s%> rejoiceth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> When the whole earth שְׁמָמָ֖ה <S%H8077><s%> thee desolate אֶעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> I will make לָּֽךְ׃

כְּשִׂמְחָ֨תְךָ֜ <S%H8057><s%> As thou didst rejoice לְנַחְלַ֧ת <S%H5159><s%> at the inheritance בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> it שָׁמֵ֖מָה <S%H8074><s%> because it was desolate כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so אֶעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> so will I do לָּ֑ךְ שְׁמָמָ֨ה <S%H8077><s%> unto thee thou shalt be desolate תִֽהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> O mount שֵׂעִיר֙ <S%H8165><s%> Seir וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֱד֣וֹם <S%H123><s%> and all Idumea כֻּלָּ֔הּ <S%H3605><s%> all וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> [even] all of it and they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD פ
